guidance.title: Addition Problems
description: Count on your fingers or use objects to help.

guidance.title: Subtraction Problems
description: Take away objects to find the answer.

parent_guidance.title: How to Help with Addition
description: Encourage your child to use manipulatives like blocks or toys.
Show them how to count forward from the first number.
Praise their efforts, not just correct answers.

parent_guidance.title: Supporting Subtraction Learning
description: Help your child visualize taking away by using physical objects.
Be patient as this concept takes time to master.
